messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Hello crew onboard on Space Station 13. We have a little experiment we need to test on your station. We call it the purge. When we send you a signal, space law is lifted and you can do as you wish. We have sent a little ferry to your dock. Good luck. May the odds be with you.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Let the purge begin! DING DING DING!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Law Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in super fucked station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The experiment was a success i'd say, i survived. -Harlow

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: fuck you don't we own your soul.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Cent calm your tits smone has my overide its fine i like nano

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Captain. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.
